review: Generally, this is a pretty slick little piece of tech, but I have to knock it down from 5 to 3 stars because when I watch video, either on Netflix or Amazon Prime, it goes black every few minutes for a second or two. Sometimes the video picks up, but other times I have to hit play again as it will act as though I hit the pause button. This makes it really distracting and I've gone back to my PS3 for watching videos. I've tried rebooting the unit and it has had no effect. I tend to think it must be a flaw in the stick as it happens with both services.

review: It's good when it works but seems like once every couple days it'll have to be rebooted as it'll lose wireless connection and not be able to connect.  Once it's rebooted it connects with no issues.  Our Apple TV hasn't been rebooted in months without any issues.  If it was't for having to reboot it so often I would definitely give it 5 stars but it's that much of an inconvenience having to reboot it frequently.  The Fire TV Stick is the only device that has wireless issues, tried both bands and it does it on both.
author: Chester

review: Managed to buy when it was $20 and it was a steal.  At $39 it is still a great buy.  Small and has an adapter for TVs with crowded HDMI ports.  Streams very quickly and has a wake function so if you push the Home button on the remote it will tell the TV to change inputs.
